Date: 2025-01-16 03:12
Subject: New entity - Guess Emirates LLC
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Savio,

 

Hope you are well.

 

Please note that we have a new entity formed called Guess Emirates LLC which will be the owner of the Guess brand operations in UAE.

 

Kindly request GIG to add the mentioned entity as an additional insured to the PAR and Liability insurance policies of Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

There is no change in sum insured as the existing Guess stores will be migrated under the new legal entity.

 

Appreciate your kind support on the matter.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION
